## This cluster template file lets you insert extra lines of code into
## the cluster.bat file used for Windows clusters.
## Any code you enter into this file will be executed after connecting to
## the other computers, but before running the Xplorer startup code.
## Any lines started with '##' will be ignored.
## Example:
## net use H: \\mambo.vrac.iastate.edu\home\users\mcdoe
